uk.fictitiousurl.contactmanager

Class FileSaveRetrieveImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.fictitiousurl.contactmanager.FileSaveRetrieveImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, FileSaveRetrieve

    public class FileSaveRetrieveImpl
extends Object
implements FileSaveRetrieve, Serializable
    Deals with saving ContactManagerImpl state to a string and or an external text file. This development version uses SerialEncoderImplXSTREAMXML to produce XML format files.
    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    3.0.01
    Author:
    Oliver Smart <osmart01@dcs.bbk.ac.uk>
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • retrieveFromFile

        public ContactManagerPlus retrieveFromFile()
        decodes ContactManagerPlus from the current fileName, that must have been written by saveToFile.
        Specified by:
        retrieveFromFile in interface FileSaveRetrieve
        Returns:
        the contactManagerPlus encoded in the input string
        Throws:
        UncheckedIOException - if there is a problem opening or reading from the file
        RuntimeException - if there is a problem in opening the file, reading from it or decoding the object

      • saveToFile

        public void saveToFile(ContactManagerPlus contactManager)
        Saves the contactManager to the current fileName
        Specified by:
        saveToFile in interface FileSaveRetrieve
        Parameters:
        contactManager - the ContactManager to save
        Throws:
        RuntimeException - if there is an error in encoding the contactManager
        UncheckedIOException - if there is a problem opening or writing to the file
